abstract: Some of the top-performing funds of the fourth quarter found success by counting on energy stocks, gold producers and gains in the job market.
snippet: Some of the top-performing funds of the fourth quarter found success by counting on energy stocks, gold producers and gains in the job market.
lead_paragraph: FEAR dominated many headlines in the fourth quarter, as unemployment in the United States, a debt crisis in Europe and inflation in China nagged at investors. But hope for an economic resurgence bubbled up, too, and a variety of market sectors had positive returns.

headline.main: Three Funds Hit the Jackpot With a Variety of Bets
headline.print_headline: Three Funds Hit the Jackpot With a Variety of Bets
